location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 144 x 130 mm, on sheet 231 x 144 mm.Materials: Printed on paper.

mods.abstract: Map of south west Persia, showing coastlines, rivers, and the region’s principal towns and cities. Red lines between towns, which are numbered 1, 2, 3, 3a, 4 and 4a, indicate road routes that are described in detail in part IV of the enclosing volume (ff 84-175).
